Reviews.Title: Canon EOS 5D Mark III Camera
Reviews.Author: FireSpirit Designs
Reviews.Content: Just got a chance to really use this camera in the past couple of weeks & I'm really impressed with it, especially the HDR setting! Talk about detail! I still have a lot to learn with this camera, especially because I normally use Olympus E series cameras, which I do find a little more user friendly. But, this one comes with a very detailed manual, which will help tremendously. This is my 1st Canon camera & I bought it mainly because I wanted a full frame camera with HDR capabilities. This camera is amazing and you can't go wrong buying it. I really hesitated to spend that much money on a camera, but in the end decided to go for it. This will be a great addition to my Olympus cameras because it allows me to do things I can't with my Olympus. Canon has a winner with this new camera in their line & I'm going to enjoy learning how to really make it work for me. If you're an advanced amateur or a professional, this will be a great addition to your tools! What a great early Christmas gift to myself! :)
